description: 烧烤啤酒沙滩排球？听起来你的派对似乎需要些耳目一新的项目，这款最高可承重200公斤的充气载人仓鼠球能在包括海滩和草地的多样地貌上平稳滚动，让你和朋友们在巨大的泡泡中重塑世界观
content: Travel over virtually any terrain just like a pet rodent in this human hamster ball. Built from a reinforced translucent material, the hamster ball lets you roll around safely inside of a bubble that provides a breathtaking view of the nauseating world around you.

titleCN: 智能螺栓管道电线探查器
description: 这款可通过USB连接5.0版本以上安卓手机的智能螺栓管道电线探测器，能在屏幕上实时地显示出4英尺厚度的水泥墙或石膏板下的种种隐秘物件，让你在下一次室内小装修时不必再忐忑不安步步惊心
content: Take the guesswork out of your next construction project with this smartphone assisted stud finder. Rather than having to rely on expensive tools, this attachment lets you see up to four inches through drywall and concrete to detect studs, wires, and pipes.

The magnetic knife block set combines elegance and functionality to provide an extremely accessible place for your kitchen cutlery. The set includes six top caliber stainless steel blades that boast a lightweight design that makes them incredibly easy to handle.

description: 这款应用人体工程学原理设计的免持狗链自带防水口袋和水杯托架，具有缓冲减震功能的绳索可分散负载，让你可以和爱犬一起在绿色的山野中迎着清晨灿烂的阳光或傍晚落日的余晖一起自由奔跑
content: Taking your four legged friend on runs and jogs is more convenient than ever thanks to this hands free dog leash. It features an ergonomic load-dispersing design with a shock-absorbing leash, and even boasts a water-resistant pocket, and a water bottle holder.

description: 这款轻便耐用充满设计感的固定齿轮单速自行车带有40mm的车轮，触地感卓越的700x28C Thickslick轮胎，以及用高张力钢材制成的车架，轮胎上的太阳能涂料能在夜幕降临后闪烁出耀眼光芒
content: Greatly minimize the risk of getting hit while riding in poorly lit areas by pedaling on this eye-catching glow in the dark bicycle. This sleek single speed fixed gear bike boasts deep dish 50mm wheels, and a high-tensile steel frame coasted in solar-activated paint that glows!

description: 这项起源于夏威夷冲浪教练为教导学员时方便移动而发明的水上运动已渐风靡全球，这款充电后能以5MPH的速度航行90分钟的电动立式桨板不但能让你休息僵硬的双臂，更能确保在退潮时顺利返航
content: Enjoy paddle boarding without tiring your poor old arms out by hitting the water on this electric stand-up paddle board. This electric paddle board features a detachable battery pack and can travel at 5 miles per hour for over one and a half hours on a single charge.

description: 这款受到荷叶天然疏水性启发并采用尖端纳米技术达到相似效果的聚酯纤维防污疏水T恤衫，能将溅到表面的液体颗粒化为细小的水滴并使其沿着衣料自然滑落，非常适合咖啡店员或餐厅服务员工作时穿着
content: The stainproof hydrophobic shirt is the last white shirt you’ll ever need to buy. It employs nanotechnology designed to repel water and dirt so that it remains remarkably clean in between washes making this an ideal garment for anyone in the restaurant industry.

description: 这款精致美观仅重80克的锌铝合金防风打火机钥匙链自带一条钢板材质通过USB充电后可点火100次的热能保险丝，让你即便忘带打火机也依然可以吞云吐雾，内嵌的LED灯让你在黑暗中不会迷失方向
content: Ensure you’re never caught without a lighter when you want to light one up by carrying around this cigarette lighter keychain. Weighing only 80 grams, it features a steel plate strip thermal fuse, a zinc alloy key ring, and even a handy built-in LED flashlight.

Battle the heat on hot and sunny days by cooling off with help from the Ryobi Air conditioner drink cooler. This rugged 50 quart capacity cooler comes with a built-in 18-Volt One+ battery that runs for over 4 hours and blasts a cool breeze out of the front facing vent.

description: 这款设计精美的卡西欧G-Shock Rangeman机械腕表专为户外运动爱好者们量身打造，除了传统的防震防水功能之外，还添加了诸如测量气压温度海拔等野外探险时的必备功能，内置的GPS还可全球定位
content: The G-Shock Rangeman rugged watch was made with outdoorsmen and adventurers in mind. Shock resistant and waterproof up to 200 meters, it is capable of tracking barometric pressure, temperature, and altitude – in addition to GPS navigation.

description: 你是否体验过因坐在体育场看台看台而无法看清比赛细节的沮丧？或者坐在室内剧院后排而无法尽情欣赏音乐会或芭蕾舞的无奈？这款无需手扶的望远镜为你提供3倍的放大效果让你尽情体验每个细节
content: Enjoy watching the action close-up at the game or concert by putting on these hands-free binoculars. They feature a lightweight design and magnify up to 3 times so that you can see all the action without focusing too closely on just one spot.

description: 这款用高级仿熊皮人造皮草制成的熊臂长袖T恤衫穿起来暖和透气而且无与伦比得舒适，特别适合在初夏阿拉斯加广袤的苔原上观赏慵懒肥硕的棕熊捕捉三文鱼时穿着
content: As ‘Muricans, it is our God given right to bear arms – literally – with these bear arms t-shirts. Honoring the tradition set forth by our Founding Fathers, the bear arms shirt features a set of plush forearm bear fur that will keep you warm and make you look straight grizzly.

titleEN: Pooping Please Come Back Later Sign
description: 这款仿照宾馆标准的“请勿打扰”提示牌用硬塑料和防水墨水制成的9CMx24CM的“正在如厕稍后再来”提示牌，保证你在处理自己的“私人问题”时不受任何打扰的干预
content: Avoid others from interrupting your private bathroom time while you’re trying to do your thing by hanging up this “pooping please come back later” sign. Simply hang it up on the door knob just like you would a “do not disturb” sign on a hotel room door.

titleEN: Makita Power Tool Battery Coffee Maker
description: 举世闻名的日本工匠精神在于把生活中每个细微的环节做的尽善尽美，这款显然受到日式便当盒启发的便携式可充电无线咖啡机使用锂电池供电，让你在野营钓鱼或户外探险时也能喝到新鲜美味的热咖啡
content: Enjoying a hot cup of Joe while on the jobsite has never been easier thanks to the Makita power tool battery coffee maker. Available in two distinct colors, this rugged cordless appliance can be powered by the same lithium ion battery packs that connect to your power tools.

titleCN: 侏罗纪公园冒险策略游戏
description: 斯皮尔伯格于1993年根据同名小说拍摄的这部经典影片可谓好莱坞电影史上最惊心动魄的科幻悬疑片，这款侏罗纪公园冒险策略游戏让你重返哥斯达黎加旁的努布拉岛并和朋友们斗智斗勇试图逃出生天
content: See if you have what it takes to escape with your life when all hell breaks loose by playing the Jurassic Park Adventure strategy game. One player controls the dinosaurs as they prowl through the park while everyone else plays as the human characters from the film.

titleCN: 美国忍者勇士儿童练习套装
titleEN: Ninja Warrior Obstacle Course For Kids
description: 自从2009年在NBC电视台首播之后，“美国忍者勇士”这款真人秀节目就一直高居收视率榜首，这款“美国忍者勇士”儿童练习套装能轻易在空地上搭建出用于练习的各种设备，让你的小勇士赢在起跑线上
content: Make your energetic little warrior feel like they’re competing just like the athletes they see on TV by setting up this Ninja Warrior obstacle course for kids. The kit includes a 50′ long nylon line that boasts a series of obstacles like gymnastics rings and a spinning wheel.

description: 古代埃及人和罗马人都相信黄金对于治疗皮肤损伤有神奇疗效，埃及艳后克里奥佩特拉甚至佩戴黄金面膜来永葆青春，这款奢华的24K黄金面膜使用神奇的除皱配方让你始终保持吹弹可破的嫩滑肌肤
content: Appear more radiant than ever by giving your skin the Midas touch with this 24K gold facial mask. This affordable and luxurious facial mask is made from a blend of soothing ingredients that are designed to help reduce the appearance of wrinkles.

description: 羡慕梅西精湛细腻的过人脚法？仰慕C罗石破天惊的横空抽射？这款手工缝制的智能足球在设置后可被配套的手机APP全程捕捉运动轨迹并给出实时反馈，让你成为球王的梦想从扎实的基本功开始起步
content: Kick your game up a notch or two by improving your skills with the DribbleUp smart soccer ball. This hand-stitched ball works alongside the DribbleUp app which gives you access to an interactive training library with live audio and instant training feedback.

description: 作为永远引领风潮的时尚先锋，这款舒适美观自带拉链小包的前卫拖鞋让你即便涂着防晒霜半裸上身穿着沙滩裤漫步在马里布海滩时，也有地方携带诸如钥匙现金信用卡等随身物品
content: Stay at the forefront of fashion this summer by hitting the beach in these Nike fanny pack sandals. Each comfy sandal comes with a strap equipped with a little zippered fanny pack that is ideal for storing small essentials like your keys, cash, and drugs!

description: 这款设计感十足的亚马逊Fire TV Cube与Alexa的语音操控无缝衔接，给你带来从电视到灯光前所未有的全方位流媒体观影体验，更别提还有丰富多彩的海量中文节目可供选择与观看
content: Amazon’s new Fire TV Cube is the first hands-free streaming media player with Alexa that delivers an all-in-one entertainment experience. From across the room, just ask Alexa to turn on the TV, dim the lights, and play whatever you want to watch!

titleEN: Mr. Meeseeks Existence Is Pain Coffee Mug
description: deleted
content: Learn about and embrace the universe’s cold and bitter reality by sipping your brew from this Mr. Meeseeks “existence is pain” coffee mug. This eleven ounce ceramic mug’s hilarious design makes it a must-have for any Rick and Morty fan.

description: 整洁美观的院子背后饱含着无数辛勤的除草工作，这款全自动低噪音无污染防盗窃无论风霜雪雨都能孜孜不倦劳作的除草机器人能一口气除草800平方米，将你从繁重的体力劳动中彻底解放出来
content: Enjoy having a perfectly manicured lawn year-round without putting in any hard work by placing the Gardena robotic lawnmower on the job. This diligent little worker is autonomous, emission-free, works in the rain, and can effectively mow a lawn area up to 800 square meters.

description: 完美的夏日应该喝着冷饮吹着微风在泳池或海边惬意度过，这款由耐用PVC材料制成的电动充气泳池躺椅设计舒适，在承重250磅的前提下可达到最高2MPH的速度，让你悠闲自得的同时来去自由
content: Take your summer relaxation to the next level by laying out and soaking up the rays on this motorized pool lounger. Made from heavy duty pvc, this extremely comfy inflatable lounger comes with a built-in motor that propels you gently across the water’s surface.

description: 这款设计独特的双USB插口隐形充电器带有一个可90度打开的支架式机身，使其能完美地隐藏在各种沙发座垫或抱枕的缝隙之下，从而在不影响整体家居设计风格的前提下将沙发变成舒适便捷的充电站
content: Turn your couch or bed into a comfy charging station by outfitting your furniture with the couch charging outlet. The slim design allows the device to easily fit in between cushions and mattresses so that you always have a handy outlet nearby.

Thanks to the world’s first automatic toothbrush you’ll never have to manually brush your teeth again! Made from anti-bacterial silicone, this flexible brush comes with built-in micro channels that deliver toothpaste to the perfectly aligned row of bristles that line the entire brush.

Make your TV viewing experience more immersive than ever by outfitting your set with the DreamScreen TV backlighting kit. DreamScreen has RGB LEDs that dynamically react to the pixels on your TV screen to enhance your viewing experience.

description: 由现实生活中真正的火箭科学家设计，这款造型独特且传热性能极佳的高效铸铝烹饪锅套件让你不但能够以更快的速度准备好可口的饭菜，而且能够有效节能多达40%，绝对是厨房中不可或缺的神器
content: Cook meals in record time while using 40% less energy by preparing them on these high performance cook pans. Designed by a real-life rocket scientist, this unique set of pots and pans will help raise your culinary game while facilitating the cooking process.

description: 如果穆罕默德不想走向大山，那么就让大山走向穆罕默德 - 这款可遥控的冷藏箱能让夏日午后慵懒躺在泳池太阳伞沙发椅上的你美梦成真，让一箱清凉饮料和冰镇啤酒摇摇摆摆走到你面前任君挑选
content: Don’t let crippling inebriation stop you from grabbing another beer – now you can remotely fetch yourself a cold brewski with this remote control drink cooler! With a thirty foot remote range and insulated walls, the remote control drink cooler is perfect for any occasion.

titleCN: 大富翁游戏之作弊者版本
description: 现实商战中充斥着各种触及道德底线的灰色地带，这款独一无二的大富翁游戏专门为作弊爱好者们设计，其自带的15张作弊卡包括了从银行盗窃到操纵对手等不正当手段，让你成为真正嗜血的商业大鳄
content: Monopoly: Cheater’s Edition is the first ever version to encourage and reward you for your dishonest ways. It comes with 15 cheat cards that command players to carry out shady tactics like stealing directly from the bank or moving someone else’s token.

description: 健康数据的收集和分析在现代生活越来越不可或缺，这款每30分钟充电可持续使用3天的防水耐用超轻钛合金指环可以追踪包括心率心跳、卡路里消耗、步数及睡眠等重要身体指标，让你时刻了解自己
content: Keeping track on your daily exercise habits and sleeping patterns is more convenient than ever with this fitness and sleep tracking ring. This ultralight ring will record your heart rate, calories burned, track steps, resting heart rate, and your overall sleep quality.

description: 征服宇宙的宏伟梦想往往从后院的试验游戏开始，这款由铜、铝、不锈钢、及耐用塑料制成的火箭发射台套装能轻松将2升的苏打水瓶变成火箭发射到100米的高空，是培养孩子科学好奇心的绝佳玩具
content: Instantly transform any 2 liter plastic bottle into a speeding rocket using this water rocket launcher kit. Crafted from aluminum, stainless steel, brass, and durable plastic, this easy to operate kit is capable of launching a 2 liter bottle of soda over 350 feet in the sky.

description: 即便关于鸡的祖先究竟是不是史前霸王龙这个问题古生物学家们还未达成共识，但这款用弹性材料制作适合2磅左右重9英尺高的遛鸡套绳设计舒适，让你趾高气昂的朋友在散步时紧紧跟在你的身边
content: It’s a known fact that a chicken can outrun the average human. So keep your pet poultry from running off when you two hit the town by using this chicken harness and leash. It’s perfect for keeping your feathered friend close by without causing them discomfort.

description: 如何在炎热的夏日里把后院变成冒险主题的水上乐园？这款设计新奇的鳄鱼岛充气城堡能在2分钟内通过其自带的充气泵搭建起来，左右两个炫酷的水上滑梯和中间的巨大游泳池能容纳5个小冒险家一起玩耍
content: Transform your backyard into a watery paradise for your little whipper snappers by inflating this crocodile isle water park. It comes with a blower for quick inflation, dual slides, and an ample opening in the middle that can be used as a pool or ball pit.

description: 对于从事创作性工作的你来说，灵感可能在任何时刻不期而至，这款结合人体动力学设计的折叠式笔记本支架能在任何情景中创造出一个临时但足够舒适的工作空间，让你永不错过任何一个改变世界的想法
content: Maximize your productivity when you’re on-the-move by setting up an impromptu work space using this ergonomic folding laptop stand. It comes with dual built-in cooling fans and bendable legs that you can easily adjust depending on your desired position.

titleCN: 电动涡流蛋白质搅拌器
description: 对于所有健身爱好者来说，这款可通过USB充电的便携式电动搅拌器能在瞬间制作出由蛋白粉、肌酸、酪蛋白及其他补充物质组成的健康饮品，也可以偶尔用来制作一下鸡尾酒、奶昔、以及鲜榨果汁
content: Mix your protein-packed workout shakes in record time by pouring all your ingredients into the electric Vortex protein shaker. It charges via USB and comes with a built-in mixer that will quietly and quickly blend all your ingredients.

description: 这款由前美国海军陆战队狙击手设计的防水荒野生存套装轻巧美观，包含了线锯、罗盘、刀片、安全哨、防水纸、打火器、捕兽网、净水药片等必须物品，平时可当做钥匙链或装饰吊坠随身携带
content: Increase your chances of staying alive in the wild by making sure you’ve got the survival grenade. Designed by a Marine Scout Sniper, it contains all the essentials you’ll need to survive such as a wire-saw, a snare, a fire starter, a compass, and many other tools.

description: 这款设计精美的迷你音乐播放器能通过WiFi或蓝牙和你的手机连接，并根据设置同步多达1000+小时的Spotify或Podcast播放列表，让你在远足或运动时无需携带手机也能倾听最喜欢的音乐与广播
content: Take your streaming music on-the-go without needing a smartphone using the Mighty music streaming device. Connecting via Bluetooth or WiFi, it syncs to your Spotify account and can store 48 hours of music that can be played without needing an internet connection.

description: 口感绵密香味浓郁的黄油往往是西式冷餐中画龙点睛的调味料，这款设计巧妙的黄油碾磨器能让你将大块的黄油砖轻松碾磨成纤细柔软的丝状后在涂抹或添加在面包饼干意面或烤蔬菜上面
content: The butter mill grate is the must-have kitchen appliance that instantly transforms any hard brick of butter into small soft swirls of buttery goodness that are ideal for spreading over your toast or bagel without tearing the bread to pieces.

description: 这款55英寸长25英寸宽仅重49磅的超级轻巧智能跑步机可以根据你当前的步频自动调节速度和频率，让你足不出户即可完成每天所需的所有有氧运动，精巧的设计可使其在用完后扁平折叠简单储藏
content: Get a stimulating heart-pumping cardio workout without having to set foot outside of your home by jumping on this ultra thin smart treadmill. It can automatically adjust speeds based on your workout and features a super slim design that folds virtually flat for easy storage.

description: 这款根据人体动力学设计的站立式驮娃挂带能像双肩背包般巧妙地将50磅以下孩子的重量均衡地分布在肩膀和背部，解放你双手的同时也拓宽了孩子的视野，是主题公园旅行或露天音乐会时的必选之物
content: When junior outgrows his baby backpack, try out this piggyback harness system! The harness system balances and distributes the weight throughout your upper body so that you can conveniently and comfortably transport your little cowboy around town.

description: 信用卡、医疗卡、健身会员卡、购物打折卡、亚马逊礼品卡、奶茶店充值卡...这款多种颜色可选的大容量36卡槽钱包，让你轻松安置证件、现金、手机、以及所有定义你社会属性的卡片们
content: Ensure criminals really get their money’s worth if they mug you by toting your valuables inside this high capacity 36 card slot wallet. If a mere 6 slots just doesn’t cut it anymore, this sizeable wallet will provide ample room for your cards, ID, license, cash, and more!

Exercise your second amendment right like a true ‘Murican with the beef jerky gun. Featuring a one pound capacity jerky reservoir and stainless steel precision attachments, the jerky gun makes it remarkably easy to shoot out custom sized jerky snacks.

description: 那些相信所谓‘抽刀断水水更流，借酒消愁愁更愁’的人们显然没有见过这款神奇预言啤酒杯，不论爱情还是事业，每当你感到人生走向低谷时时请不要迷惘，一饮而尽后命运的提示会在杯底慢慢出现
content: Those who say that you won’t find any answers at the bottom of the glass clearly never drank out of this fortune telling beer glass. Each 27 ounce cup is crafted from durable food-safe plastic and comes with a built-in fortune teller with 20 different fortunes.

description: 作为瑞士军方唯一的军刀供应商，维氏那红色盾牌中嵌着白色十字架的商标造型享誉全球，这款维氏终极版瑞士军刀虽然看上去价格不菲，但精美打造的细节及匪夷所思的设计，绝对让你感到物超所值
content: Carry a drawer’s worth of useful tools without weighing yourself down by getting your hands on the Victorinox Swiss Champ Xavt. It features a superb stainless steel construction, an array of helpful tools, and is complemented by a small side mounted digital watch.

description: 健身最大的阻力是每天慵懒躺在床上时内心百转千回激烈斗争决定要不要出门的挣扎和痛苦，这款家中健身馆让你足不出户即可进行各种渐进式抗阻力训练，再也不必担心被惰性所拖累了健康和身材
content: With the BodyBoss portable home gym by your side, there’s no excuse for not staying in shape. The simple yet functional design combines a fold up platform, a collapsible bar, wrist/ankle straps, and resistance bands so that you can perform over 300 different exercises.

description: 这款看起来可能会引起些许不适的可食用蚯蚓干由煮熟脱水后的蚯蚓与葱蒜红椒一起腌制，未添加任何其他的人工色素和调味料，口感酥脆蛋白质十足，能给你的味蕾带来别具异域风格的滋味和体验
content: Treat your taste buds to a little exotic flavor by snacking on this yummy earthworm jerky. Made with no artificial flavoring or colors, these boiled and dehydrated earthworms are seasoned with garlic and onion powder, red chilis – and are a great source of protein.

description: 这些设计独特制作精美的动物面具不但可以让你在万圣节化装舞会上大放异彩，也通过将动物人格化的怪诞艺术形式向古埃及诸神、古印度史诗、法国洞穴壁画、凯尔特人远古文明中的动物崇拜致敬
content: Get the entire barnyard crew together for a romping good time by taking to the streets wearing these creepy animal masks. You’ll receive all sorts of attention as you walk around town dressed as an eerie anthropomorphized version of your favorite animal.

Keep a trusty utility bade on you at all times by attaching this Zip Blade knife to your keychain. This ultra-portable knife comes with a frame lock safety function, a zipper attachment for everyday carry, and a razor sharp stainless steel blade measuring .68 inches long.

description: 在黑客活动猖獗信息安全成为稀缺品的今天，只需将这款防监听麦克风插入包括手机电脑在内的一切电子设备的麦克风接口中，即能在正常使用麦克风的同时确保个人隐私不被不法分子恶意窃取
content: Keep hackers from invading your privacy by covering and locking your electronic device’s mic port using Mic-Lock, the microphone sound blocker. Simply plug it into the mic port and it will become the default mic and will prevent any audio from being transmitted.

description: 想为你的浴室增添更多的生活情趣与浪漫元素？这款用高品质镀银玻璃制成的指尖触摸灯光浴室镜环绕着一圈可调节亮度的LED灯，轻轻触摸之后即可在浴室中散发出温馨而柔和的光线
content: Add some charm and ambiance to your bathroom by installing this finger touch light bathroom mirror. Crafted from high quality silver backed glass, this sleek mirror is surrounded by a dimmable LED that you can easily switch on and off with just a touch of your finger.

description: 作为美国历史上最爱通过人身攻击贬低对手的霸凌总统，川普显然低估了亚马逊卖家的创造力，在这款设计独特的产品里，川皇戴着他标志性的红领带和MAGA帽，以极为不雅的方式充当了搁笔架的角色
content: Give the Orange Sphincter a piece of your mind by lodging your pen firmly up this Donald Trump pen holder’s bum. This pen holder/paperweight comes dressed in his signature navy blue suit and red tie while sporting his “Make America Great Again” cap.

description: 想给每周四的啤酒下午茶增添新的主题？这款用通过食品安全监测的ABC树脂塑料制作的霸王龙玉米饼托盘在提供墨西哥美味的同时也让大家遐想假如6500万年前那颗陨石没落入墨西哥湾世界会怎样
content: Make Taco Tuesday even more fun for everyone by serving up some tasty tacos on this T-Rex taco holder. Crafted from durable and food-safe ABS plastic, this ferocious beast comes with a specially designed crevice ideal for hard shell tacos.

titleEN: Build Your Own Carboard Pinball Machine
content: Now you can build your very own cardboard pinball machine easily without the use of any tools with the Pinbox 3000! After assembling the cardboard playboard, you can customize the plain cardboard exterior any way that you like.

description: 看视频时不愿意双手一直拿着手机？骑单车时没办法方便查看导航？想拍照时忘记了带自拍杆？不用担心，这款造型独特的多功能懒人手机支架通过各种巧妙的设计完美解决了上述所有让你困扰的问题
content: Stave off boredom on long trips by mounting your smartphone onto the lazy phone holder. The functional design fits comfortably around your neck and conveniently holds your smartphone at the perfect height and angle for hands-free viewing.

titleCN: 马歇尔吉他音箱钥匙挂扣
description: 这款被英国著名的马歇尔音箱官方授权的钥匙挂扣采用相同的完美材料复刻了马歇尔电吉他功放音箱，4个插头造型的钥匙链让你每天回家后的第一件事就是和摇滚明星开演唱会前一样给电吉他插电
content: Hang your keys like a rockstar by hanging them on the Marshall Jack Rack! It uses real amp materials and includes four guitar plug keychains and one wall mounting kit.

description: 对于任何追求时尚和优雅的女士来说，这款设计独特的二次元卡通挎包不但美观实用，其造成的二维平面视觉幻想感更称得上是名副其实的降维攻击，让卡哇伊的你彰显独特品味的同时瞬间减龄20岁
content: Animate your plain appearance by spicing up your wardrobe with these colorful cartoon bags. These unique vibrant bags feature an eye catching design that creates the illusion you’re carrying your stuff around in a giant 2D cartoon purse.

description: 想拥有阿里蝴蝶穿花般敏捷的步伐？想拥有泰森猛虎下山般凌厉的拳法？这款设计轻巧的便携式居家拳击沙袋可被快速安置在任何地方，让你可以随时在不戴拳套的情况下进行短时间的即兴练习
content: Enjoy a high energy boxing styled workout virtually anywhere by setting up this doorway mounted punching bag. It sets up in as little as 60 seconds and features a space-saving design that functions more like a double-end bag than a heavy bag.

description: 这款艺术气息浓厚平均寿命达到400小时的鲜花铅丝灯泡在点亮时会显现出散发着柔和光晕的娇美花朵，在给房间带来光明的同时也为其瞬间添加了些许浪漫的情调与暧昧的氛围
content: Add some lovely ambient lighting to any part of your home by placing this light bulb flower lamp on display. Each bulb features an average lifespan of 400 hours and displays a small flower that lights up and emits a gentle and soothing reddish glow.

description: 你是否也经历过手机电量低却无论如何找不到充电器至暗时刻？这款提供了普通与快速两种不同充电方式的防水无线充电鼠标垫让你再不需要为此担忧，简单将手机放置在充电区域内永久保持充足电量
content: This wireless charging mouse pad makes keeping your electronic devices juiced up more convenient than ever. Available in both standard and fast charging models, it comes with an ample area designed to charge your smartphone simply by laying it down on the pad.

description: 这款设计独特需要手工组装的橡皮筋机关枪不但可以作为绝妙的枪械启蒙教具来使用，更可以被好友们用作闲暇时恶作剧或后院枪战的完美道具，其每秒10次连发的超级射速会让你欲罢不能
content: The rubber band machine gun takes cubicle warfare to unprecedented levels. This battery operated bad boy features fully automatic firing capabilities designed to unleash a barrage of rubber bands on whoever dares to cross your path.

description: 估计许多年以后再回顾时，《玩家一号》的上映和Oculus Go的横空出世应该标志着VR时代的帷幕正式拉开，作为历史亲历者和见证者的我们，绝对不应该错过这款堪比Apple II的划时代产品
content: Bring the virtual world to life like never before by putting on this Oculus Go standalone VR headset. Available in either 32 or 64 GB models, this truly tether-free headset features a 2,560 x 1,440 pixel high-res fast-switch LCD screen and requires no PC or smartphone.

description: 这种4英尺左右的食肉眼镜蛇百合花在晚春或初夏进入花季后绽放出缤纷绚烂的黄绿紫颜色，并分泌出微甜的物质吸引昆虫，等到猎物弥足深陷时再猝不及防地将其包裹并吞噬掉，嗯，是不是想起了前女友？
content: Give your garden some exotic appeal by introducing the insect killing carnivorous cobra plant into the environment. This deadly beauty is capable of growing up to four feet tall and blooms during the late spring to early summer months.

description: 从《拇指姑娘》到《罐头小人》，每一个孩子都曾用双手扮演王子或公主模拟过各种荒诞狗血的剧情，这款制作精美带有迷你瑜伽垫和迷你弹力裤的手指瑜伽套装，让你好好犒赏儿时想象中的好伙伴
content: Keep your trusty and hard working digits in tip-top form with this finger yoga kit. This handy kit comes with everything you’ll need to give these often neglected body parts a revitalizing workout like a desktop yoga mat, 2 mini blocks, and mini yoga pants.

description: 无论是Quarter或Dime还是Nickel或Penny，这款造型奇特内置动感探测器的诡异存钱罐能感知到送到嘴边的所有金属硬币，并且可以面无表情地将其吞噬下去，是教育孩子财务规划时极佳的辅助道具
content: Teach your children the horrifying lessons of financial responsibility with the creepy coin eating bank. This traumatizing device features an anthropomorphic abomination that devours coins while the lifeless doll-like eyes stare directly into your soul.

description: 这款设计可爱的清洗海绵能根据水温调节质地，冷水时变得坚硬适合用力清除顽固污渍，温水时变得柔软适合轻柔擦洗附着油腻，可在玻璃、不锈钢、铸铁、防黏涂料、皮革等表面安全使用绝不会留下划痕
content: Get your dirty dishes squeaky clean without harming their surface by using this vibrant little Scrub Daddy scratch-free scrubber. It’s made from a soft yet firm material that won’t scratch the surface, is odor resistant, and changes texture depending on the water temp.

Enjoy hands-free viewing virtually anywhere in your home by placing your tablet on this handy 360 degree rotating tablet mount holder. It comes with a long 33.5 inch goose neck that you can adjust to the perfect viewing angle – no matter what position you’re in.

description: 这款造型别致的圆月弯刀项链带有坚固的不锈钢刀柄以及设计独特的安全锁机制，让你和魔力女战士一般将致命武器随身携带的同时不用担心会引起任何不必要的关注或者不小心误伤到自己
content: Discreetly carry around a handy blade without arousing suspicion by wearing this circle knife necklace. It features a sturdy stainless steel handle and comes with a unique locking mechanism so the blade won’t ever accidentally slip out while you’re wearing it.

description: 当你在太平洋的岛屿度假或在南美洲的雨林探险时，这款不带任何有害化学物质并被美国运输安全管理局认证过的法式驱蚊香水散发出微甜的热带香味，让你保持品味和格调的同时免受蚊虫侵扰
content: Keep it classy while you ward off pestering bugs by giving yourself a few spritzes of Armoflage Eau de Toillete Spray – the mosquito repelling perfume. It’s free of harmful chemicals, features a tropical sweet scent, and comes in a travel-friendly TSA-approved bottle.

description: 当你漫步到世界的边缘，当你游历于文明的角落，当高耸基站发出的最强劲信号也无法追上到你的好奇心时，Garmin出品的这款可接发信息查看天气触发SOS求救的迷你铱星电话让你和世界始终保持联络
content: The Garmin inReach mini sat-comm device is your go-to gadget for staying in touch when you venture off the grid. It can do everything from sending and receiving texts to accessing NOAA weather charts and triggering a SOS alert in the case of an emergency.

description: 没有任何早餐比得上一杯味道香醇的榛子咖啡和一打新鲜出炉多种口味的美式甜甜圈，这款设计别致方便易用的甜甜圈烤面包机让你每天早晨轻松烘焙新鲜可口的迷你甜甜圈并加上你最钟爱的霜糖
content: Upgrade your daily breakfast menu by making donuts a regular staple using this donut toaster. This easy-to-use appliance lets you make a batch of eight impossibly fresh and delicious mini donuts with absolutely no mess in just three minutes.

description: 无论是在家中陪孩子玩耍还是在办公室闲暇时娱乐，这款设计巧妙安全耐用的迷你桌面投石器组装方便并自带6个刺装投掷小球，让你轻松将任何场所变成一场惊心动魄的中世纪城堡攻坚战
content: Spice up things at work by declaring war on your cubicle mates with this desktop catapult. This wildly entertaining and not at all distracting toy sets up in a snap and includes six small spiked balls that you can launch up to thirty feet away.

description: 每一次户外露营都是和大自然亲密接触的宝贵机会，这款由绵密厚网织就的防蚊虫吊床既可以让你全方位无阻隔地体验难得一见的户外美景，也可以有效阻挡所有蛰伏在黑暗中的诡异蚊蝇蛛螨
content: Enjoy the great outdoors without being eaten alive by insects by sealing yourself inside the mosquito net hammock. The thick mesh netting keeps all creepy crawlers out of your personal space while still allowing you to enjoy your majestic surroundings.

description: 拿出你全部的勇气和所有的决心和最亲密的朋友一起玩儿这款超级无敌的社交大冒险纸牌游戏，当黄色的纸牌和黑色的纸牌拼凑出最荒诞离奇的大冒险挑战时，输的那一方要不假思索的照做并发朋友圈
content: Put your dearest friends in the most awkward and embarrassing situations by playing the Social Sabotage card game. Players combine both the black and yellow cards to come up with insane dares that the other players must then perform and post onto social media.

titleCN: 便携式丙烷户外煎炸锅
description: 户外露营时如何确保口中的美食不辜负眼前的美景？这款便携式丙烷户外煎炸锅设计别致，扁平的圆形锅面可用来快炒或煎炸，中间5英尺深的柱状锅体可以用来烹煮和油炸，让你眼福口福一个不误
content: Now you can whip up a finger-licking deep fried meal virtually anywhere with this portable outdoor propane deep fryer. It features an ample circular cooking surface ideal for frying in addition to a 5-inch deep saucer in the middle so that you can deep fry and boil.

description: 对于孩子们来说，夏日傍晚里打的每一次水仗都是欢乐时光里对胜负输赢的执着和渴望，这款设计独特可装在几乎所有水瓶上并可以将水柱喷射到30英尺开外的火箭炮水枪头让你弹指间轻松碾压对手
content: Ensure victory by refilling less than your opponent by using this bazooka water gun instead of a standard Super Soaker. The inventive design features a nozzle that allows you to screw on almost any plastic bottle and fire a stream of water up to 30 feet away.

description: 对于狂热的星战迷们来说，生活中到处都充斥着发挥创意的机会，这款根据维达勋爵标志性的黑色头盔设计的不锈钢茶壶以及旁边光剑形状的茶壶把手，硬生生地将烧水变成了一种行为艺术
content: Channel the power of the Dark Side to boil your water by pouring it into this imposing Darth Vader helmet tea kettle. Made in the likeness of Lord Vader’s iconic black helmet, it features a sturdy stainless steel construction and is complemented by a lightsaber hilt handle.

description: 这款设计精巧不含任何化学物质的便携式太阳能灭蚊仪通过等离子蓝光吸引蚊虫自投罗网后用弱电将其彻底消灭，用最低耗的能源和最高效的节奏为你创造出一个静怡而舒适的居家环境
content: Help keep your home free of pesky bugs and insects by placing this solar powered mosquito zapper on the job. It provides a safe and chemical-free way to get rid of unwanted insects and features a compact design that makes it ultra-portable.

description: 所有试图从巨大工作压力中得到释放的白领们、所有和注意力缺陷障碍或自闭症努力搏斗的斗士们、所有下定决心戒除烟瘾但被尼古丁折磨的勇敢者，这款黏弹湿软的解压球帮你释放所有的焦虑和紧张
content: Relieve stress while infecting yourself with one of these disease stress balls. Available in a variety of infectious diseases like small pox, the zombie virus, and the bubonic plague, each ball will erupt into painful blisters with every squeeze.

titleCN: 可充气太阳能灯笼/手机充电器
description: 当你暂时抛开一切俗务躲到文明世界的角落时，这款便携式可充气太阳能灯笼/手机充电器既能变成150流明的防水灯笼，又可以为你的手机随时充电，记得将放气后只有扁扁一层的它放入你的行囊
content: Keep your phone juiced up when you disconnect from the modern world by packing along this inflatable solar lantern and phone charger. This 2-in-1 device inflates into a 150 lumen waterproof lantern that doubles as a handy phone charger that packs flat for easy storage.

description: 作为家中最私密的角落，浴室理所当然地是最彰显个人品味和情趣的场所，这款对好莱坞经典影片做了无厘头艺术加工的金刚树懒主题浴帘，让有机会进入你浴室的那个人在会心一笑中了解你的另一面
content: Avoid costly remodeling jobs and revamp your bathroom’s decor the easy way – with the Slothzilla shower curtain! This adorable shower curtain not only keeps your bathroom dry but will entertain all with the epic masterpiece portrayed on the curtain itself.

titleCN: 便携式迷你颜色感测器
description: 不管是业余装修爱好者还是专业室内设计师，这款可挂在钥匙链上的便携式迷你颜色感测器能准确辨识出超过0.5″固体平面上的涂料颜色，让你不但可以随时随地发现并欣赏美，还可以对其进行准确记录
content: The Nix mini color sensor eliminates human error so that you can instantly and accurately get paint and color matches from virtually anything around you. This powerful hand-held tool can scan almost anything as long as the surface is larger than 0.5″ and is solid.

description: 据圣经旧约胡诌福音早餐记28章16节记载，每一个信徒都应该从一顿丰盛可口的早餐开始其虔诚的一天；这款以耶稣基督为主题的烤面包机，让你在每天清晨补充营养时领略充满荣光的弥赛亚肖像
content: Breakfast 8:16 – Peter saideth onto Joseph, prepare thy pre-lunch meal making useth of the Jesus toaster to feast on thy daily toast. Each toast is graced by a glorious portrait of the mighty messiah and forms an integral part of a balanced and god-fearing breakfast.

titleCN: 高亮度可调控移动光源
description: 无论是在神秘幽静的森林里露营还是在漆黑一片的野外中施工，这款坚硬金属外骨骼构造设计巧妙能做180度扭转的的便携式可调控移动光源，能提供最高1200流明的四种级别光线瞬间将黑夜变白昼
content: Instantly illuminate the darkest of places using this 1200 lumen rover mobile task light. It features a lightweight ultra portable design, a sturdy steel exoskeleton, four lighting modes, and can pivot almost 180 degrees so that you can easily adjust it.

description: 即便作为最忠实的爱犬人士，在享受爱犬陪伴的同时也会时不时地为狗狗进食后的那一片狼藉感到头痛不已，这款防脏乱高级宠物食盘通过巧妙的设计让你从此毋需再去清理洒满一地的狗粮和溢满一地的水渍
content: Keep your pet’s feeding area from turning into a pigsty during mealtime by using these mess proof elevated pet bowls. The design prevents food from spilling out while also filtering overflowing water into a lower reservoir that you can easily drain afterwards.

description: 是否经历过在截止日期前的最后一刻装订论文却因为用完了订书针而情绪崩溃？这款造型可爱携带方便根据人体工程学设计的订书机不需要传统的金属订书针，而通过打孔创造出足够坚实的密封口固定纸张
content: Place a new spin on the way you attach papers by binding them together with the staple free stapler. Rather than using traditional metal staples, it makes tiny holes that create a sturdy seal that is strong enough to clinch up to five sheets of paper together.

description: 每一次刺激的荒野冒险固然充满乐趣，但永远切记要为最坏的情况最好准备，这款覆盖黑色陶瓷涂料由420HC钢打造的Gerber Ghoststrike固定刀片匕首锋利无比，其骨骼式的外观设计便于隐藏和携带
content: Ensure you’re never caught unprepared by keeping the Gerber Ghoststrike fixed blade knife handy. Expertly crafted from 420HC steel with a black ceramic coating, this American-made knife features a compact skeletal frame that can be discreetly carried.

description: 虽说势能动能电能之间的相互转换是高中物理课本中的知识，但这款重力自供电LED灯利用简单地原理做出了极具创意的产品，只需一个超过26磅的袋子，你就可以得到齿轮缓缓转动后带来的20分钟光明
content: Get instant lighting wherever and whenever you need it by turning to the gravity self-powered LED lamp. Simply fill the provided bag with up to 26 lbs. of weight and pull the cord to winch up the bag and watch as it creates 20 minutes of light on its way down.

description: 即便对爱犬再宠爱的主人也会被落满家里每一个角落的纤细狗毛搞得眉头紧蹙，这款设计美观穿着轻便透气性极佳的狗狗防掉毛紧身衣有多种颜色和尺寸可选，在消除清扫烦恼的同时也让爱犬更加时尚
content: Keep your precious pooch from shedding all over your home by dressing him up in one of these snazzy dog leotards. They’re lightweight, breathable, and are available in a range of sizes and colors so that you can find the one that’s perfect for your canine.

description: 这款简单但不失创意的易拉罐密封盖通过巧妙地设计不但能有效防止饮料洒溢出来，还可以轻松阻止嗜糖的小虫子飞进罐中，让你喝了一半的碳酸饮料可以保持更长的时间
content: Keep your tasty pop from going stale too soon with help form this sealing soda can lid. Apart from minimizing the risk of spills, it keeps pesky insects from flying into your drink, while also helping your carbonated beverage last 58% longer than normal.

description: 这款做工精美品味独特的高端桌上足球台采用了人体工程学的木制操纵柄和打磨精致的金属球员杆，既为你带回大学兄弟会的欢乐消遣气氛，又为你低调奢华的室内设计增添了一份端庄优雅和青春情趣
content: The Essex foosball table will make your humble abode a funner place for all without making it look like a college dorm. This official competition sized table is complemented by ergonomic wooden handles and steel player rods that spin and slide with ease.

description: “老兵不死，只是逐渐凋零”，这款由野战部队战术背心为灵感设计的啤酒隔热套甚至包括了可调节肩带，力图在每一个细节都确保真实，在帮啤酒保持冰凉透爽的同时默默向现役或老兵们致敬
content: Protect your icy beverage from heating up too fast when you’re holding it by placing it inside this tactical vest beer koozie. This heavy duty koozie features a military inspired design made to look like a small tactical vest -complete with adjustable shoulder straps.

Craft Beef: A Revolution is the must-read book that delves into the craft beef movement underway in our country. The movement looks to improve meat quality by providing us with top quality beef raised in humane ranches in zero stress environments.

description: 是否想把家里装修成霍格沃茨校长办公室那样四处充满惊喜和玄机？这款DIY隐藏门套装可以让你将普通的书架变成一扇通往密室的隐秘通道，你距邓布利多就只差一顶分院帽一只火凤凰及一把格林芬多宝剑了
content: Add a little intrige to your humble abode by creating your own private space using this DIY hidden door kit. With this kit you will be able to transform your regular bookshelf into a passageway that leads to an undisclosed area of your home.

description: 对那些喜欢从挤粉刺或挤黑头的过程中获取奇怪欢乐感的少数派人士们来说，这款专为你们的诡异嗜好设计的专门玩具可以让你们在完全卫生和安全的情形下轻松得到内心所期待的愉悦和满足
content: Satisfy your quirky and gross obsession without resorting to unhygienic acts by grabbing a hold of this pimple popping toy. This unique and eerily satisfying toy comes with 15 plump and juicy whiteheads that are ripe for picking!

description: 这款独一无二的锤柄口袋弹弓通过巧妙地设计完美地将口袋弹弓的高射速与传统弹弓的精准度结合在了一起，让你在射程更远的情况下实现更高的命中率，真正做到百步穿杨弹无虚发
content: Shoot further and more accurately than ever before by decimating your target with the hammer handle pocket slingshot. The clever design combines the firing speed of the pocket slingshot with the control and precision of a traditional slingshot so you always hit your mark.

titleCN: 超现实主义无键鼠标键盘
description: 这款超现实主义无键盘鼠标键盘不但念起来绕口看起来更加震撼，通过充满创意的设计巧妙地将传统键盘上128个字符加鼠标移植到了2个根据人体工程学打造的雕刻球面上，让你如打碟一般打字打游戏
content: Embrace the future and upgrade your computer workstation with the keyless mouse and keyboard. The innovative design offers the 128 character capability of a traditional keyboard plus a fully integrated mouse via 2 ergonomically sculpted domes.

description: 钓鱼是考验智慧与耐心的游戏，而最新的科技让你在这场关乎荣誉与生死的角逐中更具优势，这款设计精巧的水下无线钓鱼相机能让你在手机屏幕上对水底情形一览无余，真正做到海阔凭鱼跃稳坐钓鱼台
content: Increase your chances of success when you hit the water for a bit of fishing by bringing along this wireless underwater fishing camera. This compact cam allows you to effortlessly see what’s directly below your hook from the comfort of your smartphone’s screen.

description: 想和路飞一样实现当海贼王的梦想？这款海盗主题桌游以大航海时代为背景，让你和对手们顶着西班牙无敌舰队不断迫近的压力，在法国和英国之间首鼠两端虚与委蛇，通过抢劫掠夺叛乱哗变赢取胜利
content: Plunder, pillage, and mutiny your way to victory by trying to best your mateys in the Tortuga 1667 board game. Each player holds a secret loyalty to the British or to the French and has to try to amount the most treasure before the arrival of the Spanish Armada.

description: 黑暗中开火会射出闪光的子弹，加快的射速伴随着激光的音效，这款以独特的方式向这位星战系列传奇英雄致敬的NERF汉·索洛冲击枪，对孩子们来说是有趣的玩具，对家长们来说是青春的情怀
content: Increase your chances of victory during your next NERF battle by going in armed with this Han Solo blaster gun. This out-of-this-world blaster is made with GlowStrike technology which charges the foam darts to make them glow when they are fired.

description: 岩烧店的烟味弥漫/隔壁是国术馆/店里面的妈妈桑/茶道有三段，在耳熟能详的歌词中这款制作考究携带方便的日式户外炭烧架将和式美食与日本制造完美地结合并展现，是户外露营时必不可少的道具之一
content: Whip up a mouth-watering char-grilled meal virtually anywhere with the Una Grill. This portable outdoor charcoal grill features a simple stainless steel frame that sets up in a snap, is easy to wash after use, and is accented with a sturdy leather strap for easy transport.
